summary: This document is a chain of FBI emails from July 2020 regarding a woman who contacted the FBI via LinkedIn, claiming to have information potentially related to the Epstein investigation due to a similar rape she experienced in Europe 20 years prior. The FBI interviewed her but determined the information was not substantive to their investigation.

persons.name: Ms.
persons.context: A woman who contacted the FBI via LinkedIn, reporting she was raped in Europe by a wealthy individual 20 years ago and believed it might be similar to the Epstein case. She was interviewed but her information was deemed not substantive.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is referenced as the central figure in the investigation that the potential witness thought her rape might be related to.

persons.name: Maxwell
persons.context: Ghislaine Maxwell is referenced alongside Epstein as part of the investigation the potential witness thought her experience might connect to.

connections.description: Ms. believed her rape experience in Europe might be connected to Epstein's case due to similarities, though no direct contact was established.
Ms. mentioned Maxwell alongside Epstein as potentially related to her experience, though she stated she never had any contact with Maxwell.

events.title: Woman contacts FBI via LinkedIn
events.description: A woman (Ms.) contacts the FBI Assistant Director in Charge via LinkedIn, offering information about a rape she experienced 20 years ago that she believes might connect to the Epstein investigation.

events.title: FBI interview and assessment
events.description: The FBI interviews Ms. and determines her information is not substantive to their Epstein investigation.

events.title: Rape in Europe
events.description: Ms. reports being raped in Europe by a wealthy individual approximately 20 years prior to 2020.

keyFacts: A woman contacted the FBI in July 2020 via LinkedIn, claiming a rape she experienced in Europe 20 years earlier might be connected to the Epstein case due to similarities.
The woman stated she never had any contact with Jeffrey Epstein or Ghislaine Maxwell.
The FBI interviewed the woman but determined her information was not substantive to their Epstein investigation.
The woman reported living under provable online threat for over 20 years following the rape.
The communication shows the FBI's process for handling potential leads and witness contacts during the Epstein investigation.
